title: New: HAPPY TRENDY – Sweaty Palms And Allergic To Cats
body:
I can relate to both these unwanted attributes, not that it makes much difference to the track, but it’s **Happy Trendy’s** relatability that makes his music such a wholesome experience.

Picking up where **Casiotone For The Painfully Alone** left off with his honest, slightly obsessive lyrical delivery, _Sweaty Palms And Allergic To Cats_ is for all the lovers alone this Valentines. Check it out below, and grab it as a free download from our friends at [Portals](http://www.portalsmusic.com/2012/02/sounds/cause-effect-little-chords-happy-trendy-draft).
